name: Google
description: Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Work on cutting-edge projects and enhance Google's suite of products.
requirements: Experience in Java or Python
Strong knowledge of algorithms
Excellent problem-solving skills

jobs.title: Research Scientist
jobs.description: Conduct research in areas such as AI, machine learning, and natural language processing.
requirements: PhD in Computer Science or related field
Strong publication record
Experience with deep learning frameworks

jobs.title: Technical Program Manager
jobs.description: Lead complex technical projects, ensuring timely delivery and high quality.
requirements: 5+ years of technical project management experience
Strong communication and organizational skills
Experience with software development lifecycle

name: Microsoft
description: Microsoft's mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product development and lifecycle for enterprise solutions.
requirements: 3+ years of product management experience
Strong leadership and communication skills
Experience with Agile methodologies

jobs.title: Security Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and implement security measures to protect Microsoft's systems and data.
requirements: Experience with security frameworks and technologies
Strong understanding of network security
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze large datasets to provide insights and support business decisions.
requirements: Proficiency in SQL and data analysis tools
Strong statistical knowledge
Experience with data visualization

name: Amazon
description: Amazon is guided by four principles: customer obsession rather than competitor focus, passion for invention, commitment to operational excellence, and long-term thinking.

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description: Design user-centric interfaces for Amazon's e-commerce platform.
requirements: Proficient in design tools (Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD)
Experience in e-commerce and mobile apps
Strong portfolio showcasing design skills

jobs.title: Supply Chain Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze and optimize Amazon's global supply chain operations.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management or related field
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience with supply chain software

jobs.title: Business Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze business needs and provide data-driven recommendations for process improvement.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
Experience with data analysis and reporting
Strong communication and stakeholder management skills

name: Meta
description: Meta builds technologies that help people connect and share, build communities, and grow businesses.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyze data to generate actionable insights for improving Facebook products.
requirements: Experience with SQL and Python
Strong knowledge of machine learning models
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

jobs.title: AI Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and deploy AI solutions to enhance user experience and platform capabilities.
requirements: Master's or PhD in Computer Science with AI focus
Strong experience with deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Proven track record in developing AI applications

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.description: Manage Facebook's social media presence and engage with online communities.
requirements: Proven experience in social media marketing
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Knowledge of social media analytics tools

name: Netflix
description: Netflix is the world's leading streaming entertainment service with over 270 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain Netflix's streaming platform and services.
requirements: Strong experience in Java or Node.js
Familiarity with cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure)
Excellent debugging and troubleshooting skills

jobs.title: Content Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze content performance data to inform content strategy and acquisition.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Film Studies, Statistics, or related field
Strong analytical skills and experience with data analysis tools
Passion for film and television

jobs.title: UI Engineer
jobs.description: Build and maintain user interfaces for Netflix applications across various devices.
requirements: Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Experience with modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Angular, Vue.js)
Strong understanding of UI/UX principles

name: Adobe
description: Adobe is changing the world through digital experiences. Our creative, marketing and document solutions empower everyone — from emerging artists to global brands — to bring digital creations to life and deliver them to the right person at the right moment for the best results.

jobs.title: Front-end Developer
jobs.description: Build engaging user interfaces for Adobe products.
requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with React or Angular
Passion for user experience and design

jobs.title: Creative Cloud Specialist
jobs.description: Provide technical support and training for Adobe Creative Cloud products.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro)
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Experience in customer support or training

jobs.title: Back-end Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain server-side logic and databases for Adobe applications.
requirements: Experience with languages like Java, Python, or Node.js
Strong knowledge of database systems (SQL, NoSQL)
Familiarity with RESTful APIs

name: Salesforce
description: Salesforce is the leading cloud-based software company providing customer relationship management (CRM) service.

jobs.title: Cloud Engineer
jobs.description: Design and implement cloud infrastructure for Salesforce applications.
requirements: Experience with AWS or Google Cloud
Strong knowledge of cloud architecture
Experience with Kubernetes and Docker

jobs.title: Salesforce Developer
jobs.description: Develop custom solutions on the Salesforce platform using Apex and Lightning.
requirements: Experience with Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components
Salesforce certifications preferred
Strong understanding of Salesforce data model

name: IBM
description: IBM is a global technology company that provides enterprise software, hardware, and consulting services.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Manage and automate infrastructure for IBM's cloud services.
requirements: Experience with CI/CD tools
Knowledge of container orchestration (Kubernetes)
Familiarity with scripting languages (Bash, Python)

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Apply statistical and machine learning techniques to analyze and interpret complex datasets.
requirements: Master's or PhD in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
Strong programming skills in Python or R
Experience with machine learning algorithms

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
jobs.description: Monitor and analyze security events to detect and respond to cyber threats.
requirements: Experience with security information and event management (SIEM) systems
Knowledge of network security protocols
Security certifications (e.g., CompTIA Security+)

name: Apple
description: Apple designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

jobs.title: Mobile Developer
jobs.description: Develop mobile applications for iOS and macOS platforms.
requirements: Proficient in Swift and Objective-C
Experience with iOS frameworks and APIs
Strong knowledge of mobile UI/UX design principles

jobs.title: Hardware Engineer
jobs.description: Design and test hardware components for Apple products.
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field
Experience with circuit design and testing
Knowledge of semiconductor technologies

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces for Apple's software and hardware products.
requirements: Strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX design skills
Proficiency in design and prototyping tools (Sketch, Figma)
Understanding of human-centered design principles

name: Spotify
description: Spotify is a digital music, podcast, and video service that gives you access to millions of songs and other content from creators all over the world.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Build backend services for Spotify's music streaming platform.
requirements: Experience in Java, Go, or Scala
Knowledge of distributed systems
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: Design and build scalable data pipelines to support Spotify's analytics and machine learning efforts.
requirements: Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Kafka)
Proficiency in SQL and Python
Experience with ETL processes

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Define and drive the product strategy and roadmap for key features within the Spotify ecosystem.
requirements: 3+ years of product management experience in a tech company
Strong understanding of user needs and market trends
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills

name: X
description: X is a social media platform where users post and interact with messages known as "tweets".

jobs.title: Full-stack Developer
jobs.description: Develop features for X’s platform and services.
requirements: Proficiency in JavaScript and Node.js
Experience with React and Express.js
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description: Build and deploy machine learning models to improve user experience and content recommendation.
requirements: Strong experience with Python and ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Knowledge of deep learning techniques
Experience with large-scale data processing

jobs.title: Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.description: Ensure the reliability, scalability, and performance of X's infrastructure.
requirements: Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
Proficiency in automation tools (Ansible, Terraform)
Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills

name: Dropbox
description: Dropbox is a file hosting service operated by the American company Dropbox, Inc., headquartered in San Francisco, California, United States that offers cloud storage, file synchronization, personal cloud, and client software.

jobs.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
jobs.description: Design and deploy cloud architecture for Dropbox's storage services.
requirements: Experience with AWS or Google Cloud
Strong knowledge of cloud infrastructure
Expertise in security protocols

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain the backend systems that power Dropbox's file storage and sharing features.
requirements: Experience with Python, Go, or Java
Strong knowledge of distributed systems and databases
Experience with building scalable and reliable services

jobs.title: Security Engineer
jobs.description: Implement and maintain security measures to protect Dropbox's infrastructure and user data.
requirements: Experience with security tools and technologies
Knowledge of security best practices and compliance standards
Strong understanding of network and application security

name: Pinterest
description: Pinterest is a visual discovery engine for finding ideas like recipes, home and style inspiration, and more.

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: Work on large-scale data systems to analyze Pinterest user data.
requirements: Experience with big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark)
Proficiency in Python and SQL
Experience with data pipelines and ETL tools

jobs.title: Software Engineer (Backend)
jobs.description: Develop and scale the backend infrastructure that powers Pinterest's features.
requirements: Experience with Java, Scala, or Go
Strong knowledge of distributed systems and databases
Experience with building high-throughput, low-latency systems

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description: Design user-friendly and engaging experiences for Pinterest's web and mobile applications.
requirements: Strong portfolio showcasing product design skills
Proficiency in design and prototyping tools (Figma, Sketch)
Understanding of user research and usability testing

name: Slack
description: Slack is a messaging app for business that connects people to the information they need. Slack transforms how organizations communicate by bringing teams together as never before.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: Build user-facing features for Slack’s messaging platform.
requirements: Experience with React or Vue.js
Proficient in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Familiarity with frontend testing frameworks

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain the server-side logic and APIs for Slack's core features.
requirements: Experience with Java, Python, or PHP
Strong knowledge of database systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL)
Experience with building scalable and reliable APIs

jobs.title: Mobile Engineer (iOS/Android)
jobs.description: Develop and maintain Slack's mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
requirements: Proficiency in Swift/Objective-C (iOS) or Kotlin/Java (Android)
Experience with mobile development frameworks and best practices
Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX principles

name: Zoom
description: Zoom is a leading video communication platform providing online meeting and video conferencing services.

jobs.title: Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.description: Ensure reliability and scalability of Zoom’s video conferencing services.
requirements: Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Knowledge of monitoring and alerting systems
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)

jobs.title: Software Engineer (Real-time Communications)
jobs.description: Develop and enhance Zoom's real-time audio and video communication features.
requirements: Experience with C++, WebRTC, or SIP
Strong understanding of network protocols
Experience with low-latency, high-performance systems

jobs.title: Security Engineer
jobs.description: Implement and maintain security measures to protect Zoom's platform and user data.
requirements: Experience with security tools and technologies
Knowledge of security best practices and compliance standards
Strong understanding of network and application security

name: Snapchat
description: Snapchat is a multimedia instant messaging app and service developed by Snap Inc., originally Snapchat Inc. One of the principal features is that pictures and messages are usually only available for a short time before they become inaccessible to their recipients.

jobs.title: Mobile Application Developer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain Snapchat’s mobile application features.
requirements: Proficient in Swift or Kotlin
Experience with iOS and Android development
Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX principles

jobs.title: Augmented Reality (AR) Engineer
jobs.description: Develop and implement augmented reality features and lenses for the Snapchat platform.
requirements: Experience with AR development platforms (e.g., Lens Studio, ARKit, ARCore)
Strong understanding of computer vision and 3D graphics
Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., JavaScript, C#)

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Build and scale the backend infrastructure that supports Snapchat's real-time features and data processing.
requirements: Experience with Java, Python, or Go
Strong knowledge of distributed systems and NoSQL databases
Experience with building high-throughput, low-latency systems

name: Airbnb
description: Airbnb is an online marketplace that connects people who want to rent out their homes with people who are looking for accommodations in that locale. It has over 7 million listings worldwide.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Work on building scalable backend services for Airbnb’s platform.
requirements: Experience in Python or Ruby on Rails
Strong knowledge of databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Experience with cloud-based infrastructure

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: Develop user-facing features for Airbnb's web and mobile applications.
requirements: Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Experience with React or similar frontend frameworks
Strong understanding of UI/UX principles

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyze Airbnb's vast datasets to provide insights and drive product decisions.
requirements: Strong programming skills in Python or R
Experience with statistical modeling and machine learning
Ability to communicate complex data insights effectively
